overview: Annette Egbert, Partner, Financial Applications Consultant Annette has been with Acuity Solutions, LLC since 1994 and became a partner in 2002. She is our Director of Financial Application Solutions. Prior to elevating to this position, she was our Lead MAS 90 Consultant and our Office Manager. Previously she worked with Laguna Data Systems where she assisted the accounting department in writing technical manuals for their software. Annette has mastered automating the accounting process and is regarded by many clients as one of their most valued advisors. She is a native Las Vegan. She is very active with her church, serving as a primary teacher and Achievement Day Coordinator and has also volunteered for the American Red Cross.
